title: Convert NaOH solution from pH 13.00 to 12.00

content.question: How can 100. mL of sodium hydroxide solution with a pH of 13.00 be converted to a sodium hydroxide solution with a pH of 12.00 ?

choices.label: By diluting the solution with distilled water to a total volume of 200 mL
By diluting the solution with distilled water to a total volume of 1.00 L
By adding 100. mL of 0.10 M HCl
By adding 100. mL of 0.10 M NaOH

content.answer: By diluting the solution with distilled water to a total volume of 1.00 L

topic.text: 8.2: pH and pOH of Strong Acids and Bases

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
